Package pl.com.muca.server.service

Interface PollService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PollServiceImpl
    public interface PollService
    API with higher level of abstraction for performing polls' related operations on DAO classes. Acts like an adapter (@see Adapter Pattern) of DAO classes for the purposes of PollController.
